set_queue_attributes
AmazonSQS::set_queue_attributes ( $  queue_url,
$  opt = null 
)

Set Queue Attributes

Sets an attribute of a queue. Currently, you can set only the VisibilityTimeout attribute for a queue. See Visibility Timeout for more information.

public

Parameters:
string $queue_url (Required) The URL of the queue to perform the action on.
array $opt Associative array of parameters which can have the following keys:
  • integer VisibilityTimeout - (Optional) Must be an integer from 0 to 7200 (2 hours).
Returns:
TarzanHTTPResponse
See also:
http://docs.amazonwebservices.com/AWSSimpleQueueService/2008-01-01/SQSDeveloperGuide/Query_QueryGetQueueAttributes.html
